page.title: 13GAMES CHILDREN PLAY 2
page.content: FROM OUR SURVEY ON GAMES WE DICOVERED A GAME WHICH MAY BE PECULUAR TO OUR AREA,CALLED "HOSPITAL TAG" FIRST EVERYONE LINES UP AND SOMEONE STANDS OUT AND COUNTS UP TO TWENTY-ONE, POINTING AT EACH PERSON AS THEY COUNT.THE PERSON COUNTED AS TWENTY-ONE GOES TO A POLE AND COUNTS TO 100.THE OTHER PLAYERS SCATTER ABOUT THE PLACE.WHEN THE COUNTER REACHES 100 HE OR SHE GIVES CHASE AND TRIES TO "TAG" THE PLAYERS.IF A PLAYER IS TAGGED ON THE FOOT,LEG OR ANYWHERE ELSE THEN THAT PERSON MUST CONTINUE THE GAME HOLDING OR TOUCHING THAT PART OF THEIR BODY.STILL HOLDING THAT PARTICULAR PART THAT PERSON ATTEMPTS TO TAG SOMEONE ELSE. WHEN THEY MANAGE TO DO SO THEY CAN THEN LET GO OF THE PART THEY ARE HOLDING AND CONTINUE TH GAME.
